string-array.name: description_list
string-array.item: Start server - In order to start the FTP server you just need to start the APP and click into FTP server , and then select the directory to generate the folder of the server
Log in FTP - In order to log into the FTP server you must click on "Client FTP" and fill the user and password.

Upload a File - In order to upload a File first you must be log into the FPT , then select the folder into the Tree in which you want to upload the file , click on "Upload" Button , select the file on the modal and click on select

Download a File - In order to Download a File first you must be log into the FPT as a Doctor, then select the folder into the Tree in which you want to Download the file , click on "Download" Button , select the file on the modal and click on select

Rename a File - In order to Rename a File first you must be log into the FPT as a Doctor, then select the folder/File into the Tree in which you want to Rename the file , click on "Rename" Button , write the new name and click on accept

Delete directory - In order to Delete a Directory first you must be log into the FPT as a Doctor, then select the folder into the Tree in which you want to Delete the directory , click on "Delete" Button
Delete file - In order to Delete a file first you must be log into the FPT as a Doctor, then select the file into the Tree in which you want to Delete the file , click on "Delete" Button
Disconnect FTP - In order to log out into the FTP server you must click on "Disconnect" Button
Log in Mail - In order to log into the FTP server you must click on "Log in Mail" and fill the user and password.
Send a mail - In order to sent a mail you must be sing into the mail server , click on "Write" button add the mail you want to send it to , add a subject , write the message and click on send button
Check my mails - In order to sent a mail you must be sing into the mail server , you just need to double click on the email you want to read and a modal will open with the info of your mail
Exit mail - In order to sent a mail you must be sing into the mail server , to log out you just need to click on Disconnect button
